sentences.english: Honestly, this is easier than I expected, though the frequency of archaic and rare words is quite high.
sentences.chinese: 老實說，異體字和生僻字出現的頻率比我的預期高。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the mechanism of immuno- rejection for the swine allogenic chondrocytes in transplantation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討豬軟骨細胞同種異體移植的免疫排斥機制。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the operative design and technique of human hand allotransplantation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討異體手移植的手術設計與技術操作要點。

sentences.english: Conclusion Radiation could decrease the antigenicity of homogenous nerve.
sentences.chinese: 結論放射輻照處理降低異體神經的抗原性。

sentences.english: Most megadrile earth worms reproduce by normal cross-fertilization.
sentences.chinese: 大多數巨蚓的生殖是正常異體受精。

sentences.english: Allogenic medial menisci implantation were done in group A.
sentences.chinese: 組進行同種異體內側半月板移植。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of using partially demineralized allogenic bone for the repair of bone defects.
sentences.chinese: 研究異體部分脫礦骨在修復下頜骨缺損中的作用。

sentences.english: The proportion of Variants in Shuiwen is high.
sentences.chinese: 異體字在水文中佔據很高的比例。

sentences.english: Allogeneic reproductive organ transplants are under investigation.
sentences.chinese: 同種異體生殖器官移植仍在研究中。

sentences.english: Doctors are studying a type of stem cell transplant called a nonmyeloablative stem cell transplant or mini transplant.
sentences.chinese: 異體幹細胞移植是一個高風險的療法。

sentences.english: Anti-rejection drugs, it turned out, also weakened the body´s resistance to any disease-carrying germs which came its way…
sentences.chinese: 服用抗排斥異體藥物會削弱人體對入侵病菌的抵抗力。

sentences.english: Medical scientists gradually looked forward to the tongue allotransplantation.
sentences.chinese: 學者們逐漸將目光轉向同種異體舌移植。

sentences.english: While autograft bone remains the "gold standard, " allograft bone is of increasing importance.
sentences.chinese: 當自體骨屬於“黃金標準”，同種異體骨越來越重要。

sentences.english: The form is unified and variants are reduced.
sentences.chinese: 字形上統一寫法，減少異體字。

sentences.english: Variants in the sense of philology mainly refer to characters capable of replacing each other or variants of Chinese characters.
sentences.chinese: 作爲文字學意義上的異文，主要是指通假字和異體字。

sentences.english: There are many variant characters on the Stone Inscriptions of Weijin South and North Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 魏晉南北朝石刻文獻材料中存在大量異體字。

definition: rime dictionary (ancient type of Chinese dictionary that collates characters by tone and rhyme rather than by radical)
one's four limbs/two arms and two legs
phonetic component of a Chinese character
study of classic texts, including interpretation, glossaries and commentaries
